title: GDRIVE
description: This Project is an Alternative of Google Drive. It is a cloud storage service that is focused on privacy and security.

title: Fruit-store
description: Developing a vibrant, dynamic fruit store using ReactJS and TailwindCSS for a seamless, responsive, and visually appealing shopping experience.

title: Foodies
description: Foodies is a food ordering website that allows users to order their favorite food from their favorite restaurants.
